column4: Hi. I have a basic problem. I forgot the password, but # passwd says my account doesnt exist; and if i leave it, the unix password doesnt let me write anything.
I added that just for the "please" because of fearing it would sound unpolite. Sorry.
If you've actually lost access to your system, you'll need to grab a livecd and perform a 'passwd' of your user under a chroot. FYI.
